Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: HaselTweaks CN
Description:
Included Tweaks:

- Aether Current Helper
- Auto Sort Armoury Chest
- Character Class Switcher
- Commands
- Custom Chat Timestamp
- DTR
- Expert Deliveries
- Forced Cutscene Music
- Hide MSQ Complete

- Refresh Material List

Author: Ottermandias
Name: Glamourer CN
Punchline: Change and save appearance of players.
Description: Adds functionality to change and store appearance of players, customization and equip. Requires Penumbra to be installed and activated to work. Can also add preview options to the Changed Items tab for Penumbra.

Author: akira0245, Iaotle
Name: LootMaster
Punchline: Enables you to roll on items using a chat command.
Description: Use /need, /greed, and /pass to roll automatically on items.
